text: My first time here and a little tense but Ger was very professional and friendly. Made me feel at ease. Thank you.

Brought my 2 pairs of sport shoes and asked for the quotation for glue & stitching. He quoted $38 stitching only!!!
I found it too expensive and get a new pair of shoe for this price. Mr Paul rebuked "you get a new pair" (in Cantonese).

I'm shocked how can "Her Magazine" reported on this Clementi cobbler!!

In the end I made to way to Chinatown People's Park cobblers, charged $20 for both glue & stitching and satisfied with the honest prices and good service there.
Very friendly & are able to help even when other money lender donâ€™t
